comments:
Build 20021211

I got the following NPE when I opened the EditorList view. I believe this
NPE occurred after I got a dialog telling me that the editor in question
failed to be restored.

Minor note: I also noticed that there's a typo in the name of an instance
variable in WorkbenchPartReference. The ImageDescriptor variable's name is 
"imageDescritor".

I also have this bug in the M4 build under different circumstances. It occurs 
when attempting to open a perspective.  I get the NPE in the log, and the 
default icon on the open perspective bar, and a blank area (no icon is 
specified for the perspective). I work around it by leaving the "broken" 
perspective open, close Eclipse, then re-opening Eclipse.  Here's my stacktrace:

How do I go about increasing the severity of this bug, bugzilla will not allow 
me to do it as I didn't create the bug.  The bug is a show stopper for us...
Should I create a new bug?  I apologize in advance if the answer is obvious, I 
am new to bugzilla...

Jim

The bug's already marked as Major, so Eduardo should get around to it soon.
If the bug is critical for your application, you might want to take a look at
the code and try to provide a patch that fixes the problem - you could also
use such a patch to proceed with your development until this is fixed in CVS.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 29012 ***
